Name: Inga from Sweden
Ingredients: 45 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass.
Review: Inga must like a touch of bitter Italian with her fruit.
